original_text: I will seek that which was lost, and bring again that which was driven away, and will bind up that which was broken, and will strengthen that which was sick: but I will destroy the fat and the strong; I will feed them with judgment.
korean_text: 그 잃어버린 자를 내가 찾으며 쫓기는 자를 내가 돌아오게 하며 상한 자를 내가 싸매 주며 병든 자를 내가 강하게 하려니와 살진 자와 강한 자는 내가 없애고 정의대로 그것들을 먹이리라

sentences.original_text: I will seek that which was lost
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 길 잃은 것을 찾을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and bring again that which was driven away
and will bind up that which was broken
and will strengthen that which was sick
but I will destroy the fat and the strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 살진 것과 강한 것을 멸하겠다

sentences.original_text: I will feed them with judgment
